title: Syria's Assad seeks to capitalise on momentum
text:
Syria's Assad seeks to capitalise on momentum 1:17pm GMT - 02:11 
The Syrian army breaks a rebel siege on a military base near Damascus - the latest sign of how the balance of power in the Syrian civil war is with President Bashar al-Assad. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Syrian army breaks a rebel siege on a military base near Damascus - the latest sign of how the balance of power in the Syrian civil war is with President Bashar al-Assad.
